FW REVISED No Bids November Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Subject REVISED No Bids November Due to a change in load forecasts SWEPCO will not accepts bids for the month of November I will be buying gas on a daily basis as needed Thank you for your interest in supplying SWEPCO Carol R Harding Fuel Consultant Pager

FW Arkansas Gas ConsumersOriginal Message From Jerrell Clark mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To Bryant Frihart Subject Arkansas Gas Consumers Bryant attached is the AGC load profile data that we visited about on the phone today The load data has been sanitized so that individual AGC members cannot be identified Please call if you have questions or need additional information Representatives from AGC who will be attending the meeting on August are as follows Ted Impson Lion Oil John Crnic Kimberly Clark Carl Simpson Riceland Foods Terry Freeman Bibler Brothers Rick Hice Acme Brick Bill Cates Cross Oil Glen Hoggard AGC Attorney Jerrell Clark AGC Executive Director We are looking forward to visiting with you regarding gas supply opportunities

FW Enron Confirmation Cc Brent Contacts we discussed Thanks Bryant Original Message From HayhurstB mailto aceGlobalcom Sent Thursday August PM To Bryant Frihart Email Cc HofsteeJ DyeC PaquetteH Subject Enron Confirmation Bryant Please find attached the estimated nomination for gas flow beginning Saturday August and until further notice This nomination is for a total receipt volume of MMBtu per day from the three pools This includes an additional swing purchase of MMBtu for the South Pool I will let you know of any necessary updates Please confirm the receipt of this nom change Thanks Brent R Hayhurst Analyst Pace Global Energy Services Phone Fax Enron Confirmationxls CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This email and any attachments are for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient and contain confidential and proprietary information If you are not the intended recipient be aware that any reading distribution disclosure copying printing or taking action in reliance upon this email is prohibited If you have received this in error please notify us immediately by replying to this email and promptly delete this email and its attachments from your computer system We do not waive attorneyclient or work product privilege by the transmission of this message

FW Ethanol plant will need gasfyi Original Message From Lieskovsky Jozef Sent Monday October PM To Frihart Bryant Subject RE Ethanol plant will need gas Yes it would be built in Plainview Nebraska Original Message From Frihart Bryant Sent Monday October PM To Lieskovsky Jozef Subject RE Ethanol plant will need gas Thank you for forwarding It appears to me that this facility is going to be built in Nebraska Is that correct Original Message From Lieskovsky Jozef Sent Monday October PM To Frihart Bryant Subject Ethanol plant will need gas Brian This is an excerpt from an article attached that I used to estimate the energy requirements for the new ethanol plants I thought you might be interested If you are interested I can provide you with a complete list of all the plants under construction and a list of planned constructions as well Jozef Natural Gas We anticipate that our plant will require a natural gas supply of at least billion cubic feet per year at a minimum rate of MCF per hour and at a minimum of psig at the plant site To access sufficient supplies of natural gas to operate the plant a connection to a distribution pipeline located underground at our site will be required We have no current agreement with any third party to construct such a connection File Ethanol EnergyCostsdoc

FW two sides to the storyOriginal Message From mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Frihart Bryant Subject RE two sides to the story I loved it friggin loved it I rarely do mass mailings but this one relates to all males Original Message From Frihart Bryant mailtobryant NRONcom Sent Thursday November PM To Subject RE two sides to the story This is great just great Cant you just see it Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Charles illiamscom Subject FW two sides to the story two sides to the story HER SIDE OF THE STORY He was in an odd mood when I got to the bar I thought it might have been my fault because I was a bit late but he didnt say anything much about it The conversation was quite slow going so I thought we should go off somewhere more intimate so we could talk more privately We went to this restaurant and he was STILL acting a bit funny I tried to cheer him up and started to wonder whether it was me or something else I asked him and he said no But I wasnt really sure So anyway in the cab on the way back to his house I said that I love him and he just put his arm around me I didnt know what the hell that meant because you know he doesnt say it back or anything We finally got back to his place and I was wondering if he was going to dump me So I tried to ask him about it but he just switched on the TV Reluctantly I said I was going to go to sleep Then after about minutes he joined me and we had sex But he still seemed really distracted so afterwards I just wanted to leave but I just cried myself to sleep I dunno I just dont know what he thinks anymore I mean do you think hes met someone else HIS SIDE OF THE STORY My team lost Felt Kinda Tired Got laid though This email is sent by a law firm and may contain information that is privileged or confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and any attachments and notify us immediately This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW NGPL Storage Transferpst For your review Please advise if I can be of assistance Original Message From McCartney William mailtoWilliam lPasocom Sent Thursday January PM To Frihart Bryant Cc Brown Chuck Coyle Kevin Fishbeck Don Subject NGPL Storage Transfer Bryant El Paso Merchant Energy El Paso is pleased to respond to Enron North Americas Enron request seeking parties interested in NGPL storage inventory dated December El Paso would be interested in an inventory transfer that abides by the terms detailed in the attached document We appreciate the opportunity to participate in this bidding process and look forward to your response If you have any questions please contact me Bill ENA NGPL NSS Transferdoc This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

PST Hunter Per our conversation in addition to weather and basis some classes that I feel would be of interest are the following Option Pricing Technical Analysis Power Trading Introduction Structuring If I can think of some additional topics I will let you know Bryant

RE Request for Proposals Financial SwapsThanks Mark I will get Credit approval Once you have ISDA documentation that is satisfactory please forward and I will endeavor to get it executed Thanks for your help Bryant Original Message From Taylor Mark E Legal Sent Thursday October PM To Frihart Bryant Subject FW Request for Proposals Financial Swaps Importance High I have taken a quick look at the schedules attached and unfortunately they are not standard ISDA schedules and are not in a form to which we can agree We can provide ISDA documentation to you tomorrow which would be satisfactory from a legal perspective but it will not be exactly the form attached to their email We will also need Credits approval and they rarely approve ISDA masters without any credit provisions There is an existing ISDA between ENA and an entity called EntergyKoch Trading LP which we would be able to use from our side but I dont know if that would work for them Its existence might speed the negotiation process for an ISDA since we could pretty much duplicate its terms except for credit and the additional provisions we require for regulated utilities for Entergy Original Message From Hodge Jeffrey T Sent Thursday October PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Cc Frihart Bryant Subject FW Request for Proposals Financial Swaps Importance High Mark I am forwarding this to you for your delegation or response since it is a financial swap Thanks Jeff Original Message From Frihart Bryant Sent Thursday October PM To Hodge Jeffrey T Subject FW Request for Proposals Financial Swaps Importance High Standard ISDAs are you comfortable with us proceeding Thanks Bryant Original Message From SOMMERS DAVID mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Bart D Bruderer Email Bob Ryan Email Brian Frihart Email Brian Rickers
